## 3. Fast look - cards by Arcana


* **Major Arcana** represents archetypes: crucial aspects in every life and situation.  
* **Minor Arcana** represents everyday details:   
```
    - WANDS (creativity, desire) 
    - CUPS (emotion, relationship)
    - SWORDS (logic, reason) 
    - PENTACLES (finances)  
```

All cards have name, number, arcana, suit, corresponding image, fortune telling, questions to ask (list) and meanings (light and shadow) - **78**  
All cards, except Page, Knight, Queen, King of every suit have Numerology series - **62**  
Only Minor Arcana cards have Affirmation - **56**  
Major Arcana, Page, Knight, Queen, King of every suit has Astrology series - **40**  
Every Minor Arcana card except Page, Knight, Queen, King have Elemental series - **38**  
Only Major Arcana cards have Archetype and Hebrew Alphabet - **22**  


🔮 Bar plot of cards by Arcana: 56 minor and 22 major  
14 cards of every suit: Cups, Swords, Wands and Pentacles (Minor Arcana)  
22 cards of Major Arcana: Trumps

## 2. Import data

File `tarot-images.json` includes 78 cards.   
Every card includes `name`, `number`, `arcana` (Major or Minor), `suit`, `img` (reference to the picture), `fortune telling` (3 phrases), four `keywords`, `meanings` (light and shadow), `Questions to Ask`. Other options depend on a card type.
